content:
3 Easy Ways to Get the Android Browser to Block Popups - wikiHow 
 Home Random Browse Articles Add to This Page Add Tip Easy Ways to Help Approve Questions Review Tech Feedback Fix Spelling More Things to Try...   
 Log in / Sign up   
 Desktop Site   
 Talk How to Get the Android Browser to Block Popups   
 To block pop-ups in the stock Android web browser, tap Browser or Internet → tap the Menu or More button → tap Settings → tap Advanced → ensure that "Block pop-ups" is enabled. 
 Steps Edit 
 Method One of Three: Using the Android Browser Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f2\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-1-Version-11.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-1-Version-11.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f2\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-1-Version-11.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-1-Version-11.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open the Browser or Internet App.  This will open the stock internet browser for your Android device.
 If you use Chrome, you can disable pop-ups in it instead. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/0f\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-2-Version-11.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-2-Version-11.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/0f\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-2-Version-11.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-2-Version-11.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Tap the  ⋮  or  More  button.  You'll find this in the upper-right corner. You may need to scroll the open page to make it appear.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/80\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-3-Version-11.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-3-Version-11.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/80\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-3-Version-11.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-3-Version-11.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Tap  Settings . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/c4\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-4-Version-11.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-4-Version-11.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/c4\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-4-Version-11.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-4-Version-11.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Tap  Advanced . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e1\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-5-Version-6.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-5-Version-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e1\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-5-Version-6.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-5-Version-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Slide the  Block pop-ups  button to the on position.  When this is enabled, most pop-ups will be blocked automatically. Note that some pop-ups may still occur, even with this enabled. [1] 
 Advertisement 
 Method Two of Three: Using Chrome Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/2b\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-6-Version-6.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-6-Version-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/2b\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-6-Version-6.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-6-Version-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open the Chrome app on your device. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/fc\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-7-Version-6.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-7-Version-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/fc\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-7-Version-6.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-7-Version-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Tap the  ⋮  button.  You'll find this in the upper-right corner of the screen. You may have to scroll down on an open page to make it appear.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/73\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-8-Version-6.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-8-Version-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/73\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-8-Version-6.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-8-Version-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Tap  Settings . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/26\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-9-Version-6.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-9-Version-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/26\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-9-Version-6.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-9-Version-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Scroll down and tap on  Site settings .  It is the third option in the Advanced section.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4c\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-10-Version-6.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-10-Version-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4c\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-10-Version-6.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-10-Version-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Scroll down and tap on  Pop-ups .  Is will be listed below the JavaScript option.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/61\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-11-Version-5.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-11-Version-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/61\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-11-Version-5.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-11-Version-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Slide the  Pop-ups  button to the off position.  When this is  disabled , pop-ups will be blocked. Toggling this slider on will allow all pop-ups.
 Advertisement 
 Method Three of Three: Using Adblock Browser Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/fe\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-12-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-12-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/fe\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-12-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-12-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open the Play Store app.  If you are experiencing lots of pop-ups, the Adblock Browser may be able to help.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6b\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-13-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-13-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6b\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-13-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-13-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Tap the  Search  bar.  You'll find this at the top of the screen.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/88\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-14-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-14-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/88\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-14-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-14-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Type  adblock browser  into the search field. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/df\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-15-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-15-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/df\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-15-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-15-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Tap  Adblock Browser  from Eyeo GmbH. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/74\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-16-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-16-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/74\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-16-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-16-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Tap  Install . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/95\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-17-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-17-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/95\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-17-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-17-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Tap  Accept . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/06\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-18-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-18-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/06\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-18-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-18-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 7 
 Tap  Open .  This button appears after the app has been installed.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/50\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-19-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-19-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/50\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-19-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-19-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 8 
 Tap  One More Step . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/dc\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-20-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-20-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/dc\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-20-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-20-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 9 
 Tap  Finish . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/fc\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-21-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-21-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/fc\/Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-21-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Get-the-Android-Browser-to-Block-Popups-Step-21-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 10 
 Browse to the site that gave you pop-ups.  In most cases, the pop-up will now be blocked by the Adblock Browser.
 Advertisement

 I have no Advance options in my LYF phone to block the popups. What can I do? 
								Answered by  
								wikiHow Contributor							 
 Go to the Google Play store and install the app called Google Adblock.

 How do I stop hackers from putting pop-ups on my phone? 
								Answered by  
								wikiHow Contributor							 
 Doing a phone reset might be the only option, then reload only trusted apps. Check the privacy policy of any app before downloading, and avoid downloading apps that do not have a privacy policy. 
 Thanks!

 Tips Edit 
 The pop-ups you're getting are often dependent on the websites you are visiting or the apps you are using. Websites that host illegal content are typically plagued with pop-ups, and avoiding these sites will help reduce the amount of pop-ups you get.
